headline: Regeneron (REGN): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Pullback and 90-Day Share Price Surge
summary: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN) shares have drifted lower over the past week even as the stock remains solidly higher over the past 3 months, setting up an interesting check on valuation and expectations. See our latest analysis for Regeneron Pharmaceuticals. That recent 7 day share price pullback sits against a strong 90 day share price return of 21.89% and a more muted 1 year total shareholder return of minus 9.91%. This suggests shorter term momentum is improving even as longer term gains...
